languages.text: {n}Окинув вас пристальным взглядом, бродяга чуть опускает оружие.{/n} "Понимаю. Когда прижмет, методы не выбираешь. Пойдем со мной". {n}Мутант делает приглашающий жест.{/n}
{n}He looks you up and down, then lowers his weapon slightly.{/n} "I understand. When the going gets tough, you can't afford to be picky. Come with me." {n}The mutant beckons you to follow him...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Окинув вас пристальным взглядом, бродяга чуть опускает оружие.{/n} "Понимаю. Когда прижмет, методы не выбираешь. Пойдем со мной". {n}Мутант делает приглашающий жест.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}He looks you up and down, then lowers his weapon slightly.{/n} "I understand. When the going gets tough, you can't afford to be picky. Come with me." {n}The mutant makes an inviting gesture...{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.locale_text: {n}He looks you up and down, then lowers his weapon slightly.{/n} "I understand. When the going gets tough, you can't afford to be picky. Come with me." {n}The mutant beckons you to follow him...{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}彼はあなたをジロジロと見てから、武器をわずかに下げた。{/n}「分かった。厳しい状況では、選り好みしている余裕はないからな。一緒に行こう」{n}変異体は手招きをする…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He looks you up and down, then lowers his weapon slightly.{/n} "I understand. When the going gets tough, you can't afford to be picky. Come with me." {n}The mutant beckons you to follow him...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はあなたをジロジロと見てから、武器をわずかに下げた。{/n}「分かった。厳しい状況では、選り好みしている余裕はないからな。一緒に行こう」{n}変異体は手招きをする…{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}他从头到尾地打量着你，随后稍稍垂下了手中的武器。{/n}“我明白，人走投无路的时候总是会拼死一搏。跟我来吧。”{n}变种人做了个手势，招呼你跟在他身后……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He looks you up and down, then lowers his weapon slightly.{/n} "I understand. When the going gets tough, you can't afford to be picky. Come with me." {n}The mutant beckons you to follow him...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他从头到尾地打量着你，随后稍稍垂下了手中的武器。{/n}“我明白，人走投无路的时候总是会拼死一搏。跟我来吧。”{n}变种人朝你做了个邀请的手势……{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Te mira de arriba abajo y baja ligeramente su arma.{/n} «Entiendo. Cuando las cosas se ponen difíciles uno no puede ponerse quisquilloso. Venga conmigo». {n}El mutante hace ademán para que le sigas...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He looks you up and down, then lowers his weapon slightly.{/n} "I understand. When the going gets tough, you can't afford to be picky. Come with me." {n}The mutant beckons you to follow him...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te mira de arriba abajo y baja ligeramente su arma.{/n} «Entiendo. Cuando las cosas se ponen difíciles uno no puede ponerse quisquilloso. Venga conmigo». {n}El mutante hace un gesto de invitación...{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Er mustert dich von oben bis unten und senkt dann leicht die Waffe.{/n} "Ich verstehe. In Notzeiten darf man nicht wählerisch sein. Kommt mit." {n}Der Mutant gibt dir ein Zeichen, ihm zu folgen ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He looks you up and down, then lowers his weapon slightly.{/n} "I understand. When the going gets tough, you can't afford to be picky. Come with me." {n}The mutant beckons you to follow him...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Er mustert dich von oben bis unten und senkt dann leicht die Waffe.{/n} "Ich verstehe. In Notzeiten darf man nicht wählerisch sein. Kommt mit." {n}Der Mutant winkt dich einladend zu sich ...{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Il vous regarde de haut en bas, puis abaisse légèrement son arme.{/n} « Je comprends. Quand les temps sont durs, on peut pas se permettre de faire la fine bouche. Suivez-moi. » {n}Le mutant vous fait signe de le suivre...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He looks you up and down, then lowers his weapon slightly.{/n} "I understand. When the going gets tough, you can't afford to be picky. Come with me." {n}The mutant beckons you to follow him...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous regarde de haut en bas, puis abaisse légèrement son arme.{/n} « Je comprends. Quand les temps sont durs, on peut pas se permettre de faire la fine bouche. Suivez-moi. » {n}Il vous fait signe de le suivre...{/n}
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Seni boydan boya süzüp silahını biraz indiriyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum. Denize düşen yılana sarılırmış. Gel benimle." {n}Mutant, onu takip etmen için el ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He looks you up and down, then lowers his weapon slightly.{/n} "I understand. When the going gets tough, you can't afford to be picky. Come with me." {n}The mutant beckons you to follow him...{/n}
